ðŸ“– Summary: The ripe-atlas-software-probe repository contains the codebase for the RIPE Atlas software probe, which is part of a global network that measures Internet connectivity and reachability. It allows users to deploy software probes on various platforms, including Debian, Raspberry Pi OS, and Enterprise Linux, to contribute to a real-time understanding of the Internet's state. The repository also supports building an OpenWRT package for embedded devices.
